Module crcCards

Class Class

java.lang.Object
Class
public class Class extends Object
The Class class holds the basic information of a class : className, classTime, enrolledStudents, instructorName, and prerequisites. This class has methods to set prerequisites for itself and create a roster(listStudents) for the unique classes.

      public Class(String className, String classTime, String[] enrolledStudents, String instrutorName, String prereqisites)
      This constructs a new Class
      Parameters:
      className - The name of the class
      classTime - The time of the class
      enrolledStudents - The amount of students in the class
      instrutorName - The name of the instructor
      prerequisites - The required prerequisite classes need for this class

      Parameters:
      instructorID - The ID of the instructor
      className - The name of the class
      listofAssignedClasses - The list of assigned classes to the instructor
